RelatedSentence: WRIGHT , Wyoming ( WITI ) - As severe weather goes , you could consider the supercell thunderstorm in the video below one of the most dangerous and beautiful .
The storm chasers , who call themselves Basehunters ,  captured the video of the thunderstorm in northeast Wyoming on Sunday , May 18th .
The storm chasers , who call themselves Basehunters ,  captured the video of the thunderstorm in northeast Wyoming on Sunday , May 18th .
Ideally supercells form when winds are veering clockwise with height .
The winds produce storm - scale rotation , meaning the entire cloud rotates .
This can cause the cloud to have a corkscrew appearance .
This can cause the cloud to have a corkscrew appearance .
